eventParts.text: Halt! Where are you guys headed? Don’t you know there are vultures skulking around these parts?
We’re following them! They stole all the seeds from our village and we have to get them back!

Oh, that’s unfortunate. But lucky for you I was sent out by the sergeant to investigate why the vultures have been acting up lately. I’m following up some leads and heard rumors of vultures passing by carrying big bags. Could those be the seeds you’re looking for?
That has to be it! Sounds like headed the same way! Would you like to join us?
Of course I’ll come with you! It’s my duty to protect everybirdy! I… my platoon has driven off plenty of nasty birds like these vultures! Let’s go follow their tail feathers and get your seeds back!

eventConsequence.selectionText: I guess you can join, as long as you follow instructions!
eventConsequence.conclusionText:
Alexander joined your party! 

He gais +2 caution, anxious to follow your orders.

eventConsequence.selectionText: I can see you're at beak performance, let's fly!
